Transform the way you handle text with the Text Counter Chrome extension. Designed for writers, editors, students, and professionals, this powerful tool provides comprehensive text analysis directly within your browser.

Features:

a. Character Count: Instantly see the total number of characters in your text.

b. Word Count: Get an accurate count of all words to meet your writing requirements.

c. Paragraph Count: Easily identify the number of paragraphs for better text structure.

d. Sentence Count: Know the exact number of sentences to refine your writing style.

e. Line Count: Count the number of lines to ensure proper formatting.

f. Space Count: Track the number of spaces for precise text editing.

g. Reading Time: Estimate the reading time of your text to ensure it's reader-friendly.

h. Speaking Time: Calculate the speaking time for presentations and speeches.

How It Works:

a. Paste Your Text: Simply paste your text into the provided text area.

b. Instant Analysis: The extension immediately analyzes your text and displays the counts for characters, words, paragraphs, sentences, lines, spaces, reading time, and speaking time.

c. Detailed Insights: View the results in a clean, user-friendly interface with each metric clearly presented.

Privacy First:

Your privacy is our priority. Text Counter processes all data locally on your device. We do not collect, store, or share any personal data.

Ideal For:

a. Writers & Editors: Perfect for authors, bloggers, and editors who need precise text metrics.

b. Students & Academics: Helps students meet word limits and improve essay structure.

c. Professionals: Useful for preparing reports, social media posts, presentations, and speeches.

Enhance your text editing experience with Text Counter, your all-in-one text analysis tool. 

Install now and take control of your writing!
